title: LF Top and Jungle tryouts for Plat team!
body:
Message "Dotrix#1973" on discord, or "Dotrix" in game. Please be able to commit to a regular practice schedule. Message with application:

Copy and paste:

IGN of all level 30+ accounts:
Role:
Top 5 Champions:
What can you bring to the team that sets you apart?:
What do you need to work on as a player?:
What is your generally preferred playstyle?:

replies.body:
IGN: Slowly Drifting
Role: Jungle
Top 5 Champions:{{champion:64}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:28}} 
What can you bring to the team that sets you apart?: I honestly don't know, I'm pretty average.
What do you need to work on as a player?: Communication and Patience.
What is your generally preferred playstyle?: Heavy Aggression.

IGN of all level 30+ accounts:
Gen G Crown
TuesdayFanboy
KSV MID Crown
WInnie Le Pooh
Role:TOP
Top 5 Champions:{{champion:150}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:58}} 
What can you bring to the team that sets you apart?: i can be very vocal and i know how to split and when and i know when to tp in for fights also and i dont need resources even when playing carry champs
What do you need to work on as a player?: being less aggressive when i dont know where enemy jungler is early and then enemy team late
What is your generally preferred playstyle?: Aggresive when i can but i know when to play passive and just farm
